column1: I’m honored to receive the endorsement of the Ohio Democratic Party in my upcoming primary election. We’ve been fighting together for residents of the Third District and Ohio for years and I’m so grateful for their continued support. https://t.co/oUDPmdCNwW
@POTUS violated the law. Full stop. I choose to uphold the Constitution. I choose to #DefendourDemocracy. https://t.co/zYwbTMTnmU
